body:
Comment 6: 
I think you misunderstand the situation.  A live frame (tsleep) is placed on top of
where the f frame used to be.

+-------+      +-------+
|       |      |       |
|  main |      |  main |
|       |      |       |
+-------+  =>  +-------+
|       |      | Sleep |
|   f   |      +-------+
|       |      | tsleep|
+-------+      +-------+
